statements: SELECT * FROM hydropower_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM hydropower_equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM hydropower_equipment WHERE maintenance_schedule = 'Monthly';
SELECT * FROM hydropower_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM hydropower_equipment GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM hydropower_equipment WHERE equipment_id = 'abc-123';
SELECT * FROM hydropower_equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%turbine%';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, JSON_LENGTH(service_history) FROM hydropower_equipment WHERE JSON_LENGTH(service_history) > 5 ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_schedule FROM hydropower_equipment ORDER BY maintenance_schedule ASC;
SELECT * FROM service_history;
SELECT equipment_id, service_date, service_type FROM service_history WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_notes FROM service_history WHERE service_type = 'Repair' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, service_date, service_notes FROM service_history WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 101
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%Oil Change%'
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Inspection' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT service_id, equipment_id, service_date, service_type FROM service_history WHERE service_type = 'Repair' ORDER BY service_date
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Maintenance'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment;
SELECT id, service_date, service_cost FROM service_history ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, equipment_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location, maintenance_date FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_date, service_details FROM service_history WHERE service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY service_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT maintenance_schedule.id, equipment.equipment_name, service_history.service_cost FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN equipment ON maintenance_schedule.equipment_id = equipment.id JOIN service_history ON service_history.equipment_id = equipment.id WHERE service_history.service_cost > 5000 ORDER BY service_history.service_cost DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, equipment_id, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, contact_number FROM technician WHERE specialty = 'Electrical';
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM equipment ORDER BY installation_date;
SELECT * FROM service_history WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, installation_date FROM equipment WHERE last_service_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_schedule.*, service_description, technician_name FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN service_history ON maintenance_schedule.id = service_history.maintenance_id;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT technician_name, specialty FROM technician ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, maintenance_type ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY maintenance_type;
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type='Machine';
SELECT * FROM service_history WHERE service_date >= '2023-01-01' AND service_date <= '2023-05-31';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, installation_date FROM equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, last_service_date FROM equipment WHERE service_interval >= 6;
SELECT * FROM service_history WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
